title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, May 8, 2020
description: Today is believed to be the birthday of former slave Phillis Wheatley (1753), who was the first African-American woman to publish a book of poetry.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is believed to be the birthday of former slave Phillis Wheatley (1753), who was the first African-American woman to publish a book of poetry.
itunes:summary: Today is believed to be the birthday of former slave Phillis Wheatley (1753), who was the first African-American woman to publish a book of poetry.
